scripts.prettier:check: prettier --check --config ./.prettierrc.json --ignore-path ./.prettierignore packages || (echo "	👉👉 Run yarn prettier:fix!" && exit 1)
scripts.build: yarn prettier:check && lerna run build && lerna run test
scripts.ci:check-env-var: [ -z "$NPM_TOKEN" ] && echo "❌ NPM_TOKEN env var must be set to run CI pipeline" && exit 1 || exit 0
scripts.ci: yarn ci:check-env-var && yarn build && echo '//registry.npmjs.org/:_authToken=${NPM_TOKEN}' > .npmrc && lerna publish --canary --yes && rm .npmrc
